name: 王泰典
objective: 介紹土壤的工程性質與常用的描述方式，使學習者熟悉土壤力學的基本原理，並具備相關課題基本的分析能力與計算技能。
schedule:
W01: Introduction
W02: Origin of soil and grain size
W03: Weight-volume relationships, plasticity, and structure of soil
W04: Engineering Classification of soil
W05: Soil compaction
W06: Permeability
W07~08: Seepage
W09: In-situ stresses
W10: Stresses in a soil mass, Midterm #1 
W11~12: Compressibility of soil
W13~14: Shear Strength of soil, Midterm #2
W15: Lateral earth pressuer, at rest, Rankine, and Coulomb
W15: Lateral earth pressure: curved failure surface
W16: Slope stability
W17: Soil-bearing capacity for shollow foundations + Landfill liners and geosynthetics
W18: Subsoil exploration, Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance 10%
Evaluating items: presence and response
Homework 55%
Evaluating items: correctness and submitting timing
Midterms (10% for each)  
Final examination 15%
materials: Das, B. M. (2006), Principles of Geotechnical Engineering, 6th edition
